institution_name: Oriental Nilam College of Nursing and Health Sciences

entry_requirements_raw.SPM: Pass with 5 credits including Bahasa Malaysia, Mathematics and 1 science subject (Biology/Physics/Chemistry/General Science/Applied Science) AND Pass English and Sejarah.
entry_requirements_raw.O-Level:
Pass with 5 credits including Mathematics, 1 science subject (Bio/Physics/Chemistry/Science) AND pass English.  Additional Requirement:
SPM Credit in BM & Pass in Sejarah
entry_requirements_raw.UEC:
Please contact our counsellors for further details.  Additional Requirement:
SPM Credit in BM & Pass in Sejarah

course_content.core:
Anatomy and Physiology 
Communication and Public Relation 
Psychology and Sociology 
Fundamental of Nursing 
Microbiology, Epidemiology & Infection 
Pharmacology 
Altered function of Hemopoietic and Respiratory System 
Professional Role Development, Nursing Ethic and Medico-Legal Concept 
Altered function of Cardiovascular and Endocrine System 
Altered function of Skin and Musculoskeletal System 
Altered function of Gastrointestinal System 
Obstetric Nursing 
Altered function of Nervous System 
Nursing Research 
Altered function of Reproductive and Genitourinary System 
Community Health Nursing and Gerontology 
Altered function of Eye, Ear, Nose and Throat 
Management in Nursing 
Mental Health Nursing 
Emergency and Disaster Nursing 
Clinical Practice

SPM.text: Pass with 5 credits including Bahasa Malaysia, Mathematics and 1 science subject (Biology/Physics/Chemistry/General Science/Applied Science) AND Pass English and Sejarah.

O-Level.text:
Pass with 5 credits including Mathematics, 1 science subject (Bio/Physics/Chemistry/Science) AND pass English.  Additional Requirement:
SPM Credit in BM & Pass in Sejarah

Please contact our counsellors for further details.  Additional Requirement:
SPM Credit in BM & Pass in Sejarah
